pullrequest.title: New user interaction method and resize functionality

content.raw: The resize feature doesn't seem to work properly with all multi-link models. I tested it by pausing physics and inserting a double pendulum with base and a polaris and stretching vertically. For the double pendulum, some of the horizontal cylinders were extended horizontally instead of vertically.
content.html: The resize feature doesn't seem to work properly with all multi-link models. I tested it by pausing physics and inserting a double pendulum with base and a polaris and stretching vertically. For the double pendulum, some of the horizontal cylinders were extended horizontally instead of vertically.
